history.proof: intros z H. unfold not. intros H1. qsimpl use: sqr_0.

exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall z : Z, z * z = 0 -> z = 0" on hypothesis of type "z = 0".

exceptions.tactic: pose proof (Z.mul_wd z 0 H1 H) as H2.

original: intros z H. unfold not. intros H1. apply sqr_0 in H1. pose proof (Z.mul_wd z 0 H1 H) as H2. discriminate H2.
